Quick search

Scripts¶

The directory apercal/scripts contains scripts for running the pipeline and creating mosaics

Pipeline scripts¶

There two template scripts in apercal/scripts/pipeline. One script (run_apercal_qa_apergest_happili-01.py`) can be used to run all steps of the triggered (automated) pipeline manually including ingesting of data. ``run_apercal_qa_happili-01.py can be used to other types of processing (and testing). Both scripts can be run on all happilis.

Mosaic scripts¶

The directory apercal/scripts/mosaic contains a python script to create continuum mosaics with some default settings.
